1311.content:
All of a sudden, Timmy's mom was struck with the worst hunger she had ever experienced. It was so bad, she ran to the fridge and started shoving food down her gullet. Sausages, meats,apples, and more, disappeared as soon as she could lay hands on them. Soon enough, the entire fridge was empty. Not long after, a loud "pop!" rent the air. She looked down to see that her belt had snapped. Her belly rolled out in all its bloated glory. Can you believe that in spite of this, she was still hungry? But that hunger was tempered by nausea. A nausea so powerful, that she was forced onto her hands and knees.

"Ugh..." she moaned.

Timmy had been watching this spectacle the whole time. He did not know why, but there was something he liked about her stomach, full of food, all distended and bloated. He didn't want her to throw up, though, and wanted her to injure her stomach even less. So he wished that she wouldn't throw up, and that her hunger was gone. She ran up to her room as fast as her bloated stomach would allow.

13112.content:
Timmy was in his room,later that day. He had been reflecting, all this time, about his wish and the results and his feelings about them. After his initial excitement at her distended stomach had died down, he wondered what those feelings meant. Eventually, he decided that he did not care and just wanted to see more of it. On not just his mom, but also Trixie, and Vicki, and Wanda...

He wanted to see it on a lot of women. What he didn't want, however, was a repeat of that near-disaster in the kitchen. So he said "Cosmo, Wanda I wish Trixie, Vicki, and Wanda, and my mom, all had a big appetite."

"Er... why, sport?" Wanda asked.

"I want you all to gain weight." Timmy replied.

"Er... why, sport?" Wanda asked again.

"I don't know why" Timmy said. "I just really like the idea of you all being fat."

"Um... okay" Wanda said.

Cosmo and Wanda quickly exchanged a worried glance before they granted his wish.

All of a sudden Wanda was gripped with an acute sense of hunger. It gnawed at her insides until she poorer up an entire chocolate cake, and then ate it up quickly, taking huge mouthfuls at a time. When she finally finished, she let out a huge burp.
"Excuse me" she said. She didn't think she had ever felt this full before in her life. And she absolutely loved it. She felt a sense of satisfaction in her piggishness, and also a little bit of pain. To alleviate it, she began rubbing her overstuffed belly. "Let me help." Timmy said, while Cosmo stood there, looking not a little miffed.

14533.content:
For once in Timmy's life, a wish had worked out as intended. No backfiring, no regrets, 100% flawless results. Over the next week, Vicky would grow much bigger as she continually stuffed her face with whatever she could get her hands on, which was mostly fattening foods. This diet of non-stop gorging on fattening foods was murder on her once thin figure. Her once flat stomach now drooped onto her tree-trunk like thighs, yet still jutted out 6 inches. Her breasts hadn't fared much better, going from a modest C-cup to EE-cup and shredded most of her shirts, leaving her in a bikini that was two sizes too small. Her ass had gotten the most out of the gain, her once flat butt was now able to take up half the couch and had to be pushed through doorways. Her arms had gotten some fat as well, though nothing compared to the rest of her, and her face had gained two chins.

Timmy currently sat on his bed, looking out the window and seeing Vicky talk with his parents. They had discussed firing her after she stopped wearing pants and a shirt, but Timmy "persuaded" them to let her keep her job. His parents soon left, and Vicky went inside. "Cosmo!" He yelled at the fishbowl. Cosmo, who had been sleeping, awoke dazed and confused.

"What is it Timmy?" He asked groggily.

"Vicky's back. And you know what that means." The young boy replied with an evil grin.

"Uh... You want me to poof up more food to give to Vicky?" The green buffoon asked.

"Yep." Timmy said as several cakes and pastries appeared next to him. "You've been really good with instructions lately Cosmo. What happened?"

"You'd be surprised how well someone can hear when one ear isn't filled with nag." He replied with a confident smile. "Now go on Timmy. She still has it coming." Timmy nodded, grabbing what he could and walking downstairs.

"Vicky." He called out. "I have something for you."

"Oh thank god Twerp." Came the voice of the obese baby-sitter. "I'm starving. Give it to me." He nodded, setting what he had brought with him next to her. She tore into the food almost immediately, and Timmy watched in awe. For once everything was falling into place, and he was loving it."Twerp! I'm out of food!" She whined. "Get me more!" Timmy thought for a moment, and two ideas popped into his mind...

She chuckle to herself thinking that if she had the mindset of her younger self, she knew it would be covered by her childhood crush, Timmy Turner.

She thought about when Timmy had missed a year and her crazed thoughts of being able to sit by him, but then he missed another year and another. Tootie wondered why this kid she’d spent years crushing on would just stay in one place. She decided that she wanted to focus on the future inside of focusing on the man-child who was still in the fifth grade.

Tootie was now 17 and although she didn’t like to admit it, she had kept most of her chubbiness from when she was a kid. She gently tugged on her sky blue sweater at the thought before closing her locker and readjusting her purple, oval glasses.

Maths was a great class to draw in. She was already in the top 10 anyway with her nearly photographic memory from years of watching Him, but it also gave her lots of free time, while other students worked on the answers.
155332111.title: Sure
